description: Keg Delivery - When succulent Draven Torres shows up for his weekly beer delivery, Doc Benway is behind the bar and accepting deliveries.  It's clear this isn't the first time these deliveries have been made when the two start making out before getting into some hot oral and WS action.  Once Draven releases into Doc's mouth and Doc over himself, Draven decides it's time to work over Doc's ass.  Draven opens up Doc's sacred heart with a long session of deep rimming then fucks him over the keg he just delivered.  Then the tables turn and its Draven who's cravin' a delivery.  Doc gives Draven a good, rough fuck right on the floor of the bar until both bust their loads and continue with their days.
title: Pony Up!, Scene #01
